item.title: ‚ÄúModel this.‚Äù
item.description:
Sam Koppelman on Twitter

‚ÄúAs I‚Äôve been trying to process the SBF news... ...I keep thinking back to this interview he did with @tylercowen‚Äîwhere he, essentially, said he‚Äôd risk THE ENTIRE PLANET for a 51% shot at a second planet. This man ended up St. Petersburg paradoxing himself into his own grave.‚Äù

item.title: CZ üî∂ Binance on Twitter
item.description:
CZ üî∂ Binance on Twitter

‚ÄúAs part of Binance‚Äôs exit from FTX equity last year, Binance received roughly $2.1 billion USD equivalent in cash (BUSD and FTT). Due to recent revelations that have came to light, we have decided to liquidate any remaining FTT on our books. 1/4‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/cz_binance/status/1589283421704290306

source: The Old Story: The Fall of Sam Bankman-Fried, &

item.title: Liz Hoffman on Twitter
item.description:
Liz Hoffman on Twitter

‚ÄúThis a.m. before securing an emergency lifeline from rival Binance, FTX was canvassing deep pockets in Silicon Valley and Wall St ‚Äî think billionaires, not institutions ‚Äî ppl familiar told me & @lmatsakis @SaacksAttack. Two of the ppl he he was seeking more than $1bn.‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/lizrhoffman/status/1590021299295768578

source: The Old Story: The Fall of Sam Bankman-Fried, &

item.title: CZ üî∂ Binance on Twitter
item.description:
CZ üî∂ Binance on Twitter

‚ÄúThis afternoon, FTX asked for our help. There is a significant liquidity crunch. To protect users, we signed a non-binding LOI, intending to fully acquire https://t.co/BGtFlCmLXB and help cover the liquidity crunch. We will be conducting a full DD in the coming days.‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/cz_binance/status/1590013613586411520

source: The Old Story: The Fall of Sam Bankman-Fried, &

item.title: CZ üî∂ Binance on Twitter
item.description:
CZ üî∂ Binance on Twitter

‚ÄúTwo big lessons: 1: Never use a token you created as collateral. 2: Don‚Äôt borrow if you run a crypto business. Don‚Äôt use capital ‚Äúefficiently‚Äù. Have a large reserve. Binance has never used BNB for collateral, and we have never taken on debt. Stay #SAFU.üôè‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/cz_binance/status/1590103159506341888

source: The Old Story: The Fall of Sam Bankman-Fried, &
